td.content: s:patient presents with increased Liver over 2 years. patient is a male aged 56 Ys. patient has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption he has a history of smoking o:Height 163 cm, Weight 54 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, HBsAg positive, HBeAg positive, anti-HBc IgG positive, Comprehensive Metabolic Panel ALT=120 U/L,AST=100 U/L,total bilirubin=5.2 mg/dL, Bilirubin, Direct direct bilirubin=0.4 mg/dL a:Hepatitis B p:administered HEPSERA - 10 mg daily, performed HBsAg, HBeAg, anti-HBc IgG, Comprehensive Metabolic Panel, Bilirubin, Direct, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
